thread.title: Vodafone offers four times the usual 4G data on prepaid, including a 4GB pack for Rs 250
thread.title_full: Vodafone offers four times the usual 4G data on prepaid, including a 4GB pack for Rs 250

title: Vodafone offers four times the usual 4G data on prepaid, including a 4GB pack for Rs 250
text:
Vodafone offers four times the usual 4G data on prepaid, including a... Vodafone offers four times the usual 4G data on prepaid, including a 4GB pack for Rs 250 By - January 17, 2017 “Vodafone prepaid users can now get 4GB of 4G data for a month at Rs 250” 
To compete against competitive plans from Reliance Jio and other telcos, Vodafone has increased its 4G data benefits for prepaid users. The company has announced that its prepaid users will now get 4X 4G data in all 17 telecom circles where the brand offers its 4G services. 
Vodafone users can now avail 1GB of 4G data with a validity of a month for Rs 150. The 4GB data pack now costs Rs 250, 6GB costs Rs 350, 9GB costs Rs 450, 13GB costs Rs 650, 22GB costs Rs 999, and lastly, the 35GB 4G prepaid data pack costs Rs 1,500. The extra data can be used at any hour of day or night. 
“Our customers are consuming more of content and video online. With these super rich data packs, our rapidly growing base of 4G customers across 17 circles can enjoy much more of mobile internet while remaining confidently connected on Vodafone SuperNet 4G. It will also encourage first time and limited users of mobile internet to explore more by providing greater value,” the company said in a press release. 
Vodafone’s new 4X 4G data packs are available for both new and existing prepaid users. They can be availed via digital channels as well as all retail touch points across the country. It’s worth mentioning that price of these packs will vary from circle to circle. Facebook Comments
